course.subject: ELEC
course.name: Advanced Topics in AI and Healthcare
course.description: Introduction to state-of-the-art development in the broad area of AI and healthcare, including basic concepts of deep learning and advanced approaches for medical image and surgical video analysis. Students are expected to demonstrate the capability of applying fundamental deep learning approaches to various healthcare applications through hands-on homework projects.

reviews.author: moonlightstar
reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment_content: The overall content is great. Prof also invited guest lecturer and also giving high level overview and explaining the depths of the content to the student patiently. The pace is also nice for us whose taking the AI in Healthcare course for the first time.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof is teaching us and ready to interact and do question answering with student at anytime of the course.
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is nice. Prof and TA is also explaining well on things related to the grading.
reviews.comment_workload: The assignments and final project are taking so much time, but in the end it's an okay workload for me.
